titles.title: Recognizing the founding of the Alliance for Reform and Democracy in Asia, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on International Relations.
Referred to the Subcommittee on International Operations and Human Rights.

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: 5/3/2001--Introduced. Recognizes and commends the members of the Alliance for Reform and Democracy in Asia (ARDA) for joining forces in their common struggle for freedom and the rule of law.Calls for: (1) Asian governments to heed ARDA's calls for political and legal reforms and to engage ARDA members in dialog; and (2) an immediate end to human rights violations committed against Asian democracy activists.
